description: Creates a new generic component definition in the given or default project.
title: Angular Component Options Schema

___skipTests.description: When true, does not create "spec.ts" test files for the new component.

___type.description: Adds a developer-defined type to the filename, in the format "name.type.ts".

___changeDetection.description: The change detection strategy to use in the new component.

___inlineStyle.description: When true, includes styles inline in the component.ts file. Only CSS styles can be included inline. By default, an external styles file is created and referenced in the component.ts file.

___prefix.description: The prefix to apply to the generated component selector.

___inlineTemplate.description: When true, includes template inline in the component.ts file. By default, an external template file is created and referenced in the component.ts file.

___displayBlock.description: Specifies if the style will contain `:host { display: block; }`.

___flat.description: When true, creates the new files at the top level of the current project.

___name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the component?

___skipSelector.description: Specifies if the component should have a selector or not.

___lintFix.description: When true, applies lint fixes after generating the component.

___selector.description: The HTML selector to use for this component.

___style.description: The file extension or preprocessor to use for style files.

___entryComponent.x-deprecated: Since version 9.0.0 with Ivy, entryComponents is no longer necessary.
___entryComponent.description: When true, the new component is the entry component of the declaring NgModule.

___viewEncapsulation.description: The view encapsulation strategy to use in the new component.

___skipImport.description: When true, does not import this component into the owning NgModule.

___export.description: When true, the declaring NgModule exports this component.

___path.description: The path at which to create the component file, relative to the current workspace. Default is a folder with the same name as the component in the project root.
